sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(A.USR_ID) uCnt FROM STM3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO STM2000 ( LIC_GRP_ID, MENU_ID, UPPER_MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_TYPE_CD, MENU_DESC, MENU_URL, MENU_PATH, MENU_IMG_URL, LVL, ORD, USE_CD, PRJ_TYPE, MODULE_TYPE, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) SELECT #licGrpId#, MENU_ID, UPPER_MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_TYPE_CD, MENU_DESC, MENU_URL, MENU_PATH, MENU_IMG_URL, LVL, ORD, USE_CD, PRJ_TYPE, MODULE_TYPE, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM2000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_GRP'
SELECT DISTINCT( LIC_GRP_ID ) LIC_GRP_ID FROM STM2000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

INSERT INTO STM3000 ( USR_ID, LIC_GRP_ID, USR_PW, USR_NM, EMAIL, ETC, WK_ST_TM, WK_ED_TM, PW_FAIL_CNT, BLOCK, USE_CD, ADM_YN, DEL_CD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #usrId#, #licGrpId#, #enUsrPw#, #usrNm#, #usrEmail#, '최초라이선스등록자', '09', '18', '0', '01', '01', 'Y', '02' sysdate , #usrId#, #usrIp#, sysdate, #usrId#, #usrIp# )
SELECT DISTINCT( LIC_GRP_ID ) LIC_GRP_ID FROM STM3000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

INSERT INTO ADM3100 ( LIC_GRP_ID, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, SYSDATE, 'system', #usrIp#, SYSDATE, 'system', #usrIp# )
SELECT DISTINCT( LIC_GRP_ID ) LIC_GRP_ID FROM ADM3100 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

INSERT INTO STM11000 SELECT #licGrpId# AS LIC_GRP_ID, 'lunaops-'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')||'-'||LPAD(LIC_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 4, '0') AS LIC_NO, SUB_CD_NM AS LIC_NM, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS LIC_START_DT, TO_CHAR((sysdate+3650), 'YYYYMMDD') AS LIC_END_DT, SUB_CD AS LIC_GB_CD, SUB_CD_REF1 AS PERMIT_USR_CNT, SYSDATE AS REG_DTM, 'SYSTEM' AS REG_USR_ID, #usrIp# AS REG_USR_IP, SYSDATE AS MODIFY_DTM, 'SYSTEM' AS MODIFY_USR_ID, #usrIp# AS MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM4001 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_GRP' AND MST_CD = 'ADM00002' AND SUB_CD = '01'
SELECT DISTINCT( LIC_GRP_ID ) LIC_GRP_ID FROM STM11000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

INSERT INTO STM4000 ( LIC_GRP_ID, MST_CD, UPPER_MST_CD, MST_CD_NM, MST_CD_ENG_NM, MST_CD_DESC, ABORT_DT, LVL, ORD, USE_YN, STM_USE_YN, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) SELECT #licGrpId#, MST_CD, UPPER_MST_CD, MST_CD_NM, MST_CD_ENG_NM, MST_CD_DESC, ABORT_DT, LVL, ORD, USE_YN, STM_USE_YN, sysdate, 'SYSTEM', #usrIp#, sysdate, 'SYSTEM', #usrIp# FROM STM4000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_GRP'
SELECT DISTINCT( LIC_GRP_ID ) LIC_GRP_ID FROM STM4000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

INSERT INTO STM4001 ( LIC_GRP_ID, MST_CD, SUB_CD, SUB_CD_NM, ORD, USE_YN, SUB_CD_REF1, SUB_CD_REF2, SUB_CD_REF3, SUB_CD_REF4, SUB_CD_REF5, SUB_CD_DESC, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) SELECT #licGrpId#, MST_CD, SUB_CD, SUB_CD_NM, ORD, USE_YN, SUB_CD_REF1, SUB_CD_REF2, SUB_CD_REF3, SUB_CD_REF4, SUB_CD_REF5, SUB_CD_DESC, SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM', #usrIp#, SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM', #usrIp# FROM STM4001 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_GRP'
SELECT DISTINCT( LIC_GRP_ID ) LIC_GRP_ID FROM STM4001 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

INSERT INTO STM2001 A ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID, AUTH_GRP_ID, MENU_ID, ACCESS_YN, SELECT_YN, REG_YN, MODIFY_YN, DEL_YN, EXCEL_YN, PRINT_YN, USE_CD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) SELECT #licGrpId#, A.PRJ_ID, A.AUTH_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, A.ACCESS_YN, A.SELECT_YN, A.REG_YN, A.MODIFY_YN, A.DEL_YN, A.EXCEL_YN, A.PRINT_YN, A.USE_CD, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM2001 WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_GRP' AND A.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ'
SELECT DISTINCT( LIC_GRP_ID ) LIC_GRP_ID FROM STM2001 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

INSERT INTO PRJ2000 A ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID, AUTH_GRP_ID, AUTH_GRP_NM, AUTH_GRP_DESC, CREATE_DT, USE_CD, ORD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, USR_TYP, ACCEPT_USE_CD, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) SELECT #licGrpId# , B.PRJ_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_NM , B.AUTH_GRP_DESC , B.CREATE_DT , B.USE_CD , B.ORD , SYSDATE , #usrId# , #usrIp# , USR_TYP , ACCEPT_USE_CD , SYSDATE , #usrId# , #usrIp# FROM PRJ2000 B WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_GRP' AND B.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ'
SELECT DISTINCT( LIC_GRP_ID ) LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ2000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#

INSERT INTO STM6000 A ( LIC_GRP_ID , DEPT_ID , UPPER_DEPT_ID , DEPT_NAME , DEPT_ADMIN_USR_ID , ORD , USE_CD , DEPT_ETC , LVL , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , ( SELECT ( 'DPT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS DEPT_ID FROM DUAL ) , null , '최상위 조직' , null , 0 , '01' , '최상위 조직' , 0 , SYSDATE , 'system' , #usrIp# , SYSDATE , 'system' , #usrIp# )
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM STM6000 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND LVL = 0
